name: 2048 Colors
description:
Collect matching pairs of colors and advance the level of the game. You lose if you select different pairs of colors or if you let the computer fill all the colors in the table.

Excellent game for all ages, ideal to develop:

- Reflection;
- Attention;
- Concentration;
- Peripheral vision;
- Memory;
- Agility Perception;
- Visual perception;
- Logical reasoning;
- Spatial reasoning;
- Temporal reasoning;
- Sequential reasoning;
- Strategy.

Jointly develop various skills and cognitive skills with this dynamic game, with excellent gameplay and exercise the fluency of associations and decision making.

Great hobby!
